name: Kitty's Breakfast
description:
Play as little Kitty she enjoys her morning, and waits for breakfast pancakes. Little game made with Bitsy!

Special thank you to those in the bitsy discord who kept answering my questions on how to work things :p

My first game ever!

I think it should work correctly, but if you run into any issues just let me know. 

HOW TO PLAY: 

Use arrow keys to control the character. Walk into things to interact with them. Anything that is the same color as the character is an item/person you can interact with. Some things will give different dialogue if you interact more than once! 

The game is about 5 or so minutes long

I named this version 1.0 just in case I want to add something else later (more rooms in the house to explore?) but this could very well be the final version. 

I am on twitter instagram and youtube!  

https://twitter.com/Nnoodlebird

https://www.instagram.com/nnoodlebird/
